column4: I asked this in ubuntu-server a second ago, but that room appears to be null ..

Hi all .. fired up a new box tossed Ubuntu Server 8.04 Alpha5 (AMD64bit) and it is not playing nice with bash_completion. It'll finish out directories (sudo /etc/apac<tab>) but not applications .. like sudo aptit<tab> inst<tab> smartmo<tab> .. it just beeps.
you might stand a better chance of getting a response in #ubuntu+1, thats were support is for Hardy, there won't be as many people there, but they'll be using/testing Hardy
